abilities.name: Sneaky Little Devils
abilities.description: Chaos Furies are spiteful creatures that utterly loathe the idea of engaging in a fair fight, much preferring – where possible – to stab distracted enemies in the back.
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can immediately use the 'Retreat' ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.
